sections: Your smartphone is the IRL equivalent of a magic wand. It can do all sorts of extraordinary things, from tracking your footsteps to summoning Chinese takeout to your doorstep. But if you have the

, it can also be the master of your household electronics, too. Here’s how it works? Stick this Kickstarter-funded, coin-sized accessory on or next to any remote-controlled infrared device, and you’ll immediately be able to control it via the companion app. This means you can turn on the AC, flip TV channels, and even bring your ancient ceiling fan back to life with just your phone. It's also equipped with voice commands, smart pausing and muting, and has the ability to organize all of your devices in your home, room by room. Normally, the KlikR Universal Remote Control costs $29, but
you can get one today for only $19.99
. Save an additional 10% when using code
is here to surface products that you might like.
